Now, I'm trying to get as many cards as I can w/o a GameShark. Needless to say, I need this card still, and was wondering if there is a chance Sniper will show up after an errantry to fight again?

By Anonymous on Thursday, June 15, 2000 - 03:28 pm:

By Eagle_Fierce on Thursday, June 15, 2000 - 07:34 pm:

you don't get the Sniper card from the "Spear" battle. You must find it on the fourth week of an errantry as a random monster. i think having raised a Centaur will bolster your chances though, as I hadn't raised one when I got it and it took forever to find, whereas my Dad had raised three and was ambushed as many times by it as I was with "Zilla King (That's about once every four tries, Sniper required a whopping 104 resets. That's nothing compared to how many times that I had to reset to find King Ape...and STILL never found it)."
